notes: Successive attacks with Orb of Destruction do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage.
When a melee and a ranged hero with Orb of Destruction attack one target, the slow of the first applied debuff is used and refreshed.
Fully stacks with Blight Stone, Desolator, Orb of Corrosion and Stygian Desolator.
Works against every unit, including wards, buildings and allied units.
abilities.description: Attacks reduce the target's armor and movement speed. Slow amount varies based on whether the wearer is melee or ranged.

additionalInformation: Orbs of Destruction are fully sharable.
name: Orb of Destruction
description: An ingot of chaos suspended in wizard's ether, housed within an arcanist's orb.
